name: Lemon Walker OG
description: Lemon Walker OG is a beautiful and complicated hybrid cross. With front-end parentage that consists of Lemon Skunk and Skywalker OG (Skywalker x OG Kush), this stimulating strain offers a potent cerebral buzz that transplants itself in the body with continued use. With bright notes of citrus and a pungent and slightly fruity undertone brought through by Skywalker, this strain is ideal for those seeking uplifting, mood enhancing effects. Also, this strain won 2nd place for Best U.S. Concentrate at the 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup.
descriptionPlain: Lemon Walker OG is a beautiful and complicated hybrid cross. With front-end parentage that consists of Lemon Skunk and Skywalker OG (Skywalker x OG Kush), this stimulating strain offers a potent cerebral buzz that transplants itself in the body with continued use. With bright notes of citrus and a pungent and slightly fruity undertone brought through by Skywalker, this strain is ideal for those seeking uplifting, mood enhancing effects. Also, this strain won 2nd place for Best U.S. Concentrate at the 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup.
aka: Lemon Walker OG Kush, Lemon Walker

highlightedReviews.text: üçãü¶ç Lemon Walker O.G. is some serious fire. Extremely pungent....like a skunk; eating an orange, resting in a field of lemon peels. The high is very uplifting and relaxing, without being to sedative. Surprisingly, it doesn't taste anything like it smells. It tastes more like O.G. than anything. The mood lift is quite noticeable, giddy at times with an overall positive sense of well being. Highly recommended. Myrcene 4.96 mg/g, Limonene: 1.73 mg/g, b-Caryophyllene 1.1 mg/g.

I found that it was very pain relieving from the very first, especially muscles and broken bones, arthritis, good looks, listening to tv ....talking to you ...no stress and smells good burning ....easy on the throught  careful ....creeps up on you so  ....

articles.title: The 2015 SoCal Cannabis Cup Winners
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Over the weekend, High Times hosted another Cannabis Cup in San Bernardino, where growers, breeders, extract artists, and other industry venders met head-to-head to show off their best creations. We hope you had a chance to visit Leafly and our co-sponsors Bhang Chocolates and CCIA at The Valencia for the Cup kick-off party. Additionally, we'd like to congratulate our booth buddies TLC (2nd Place Hybrid, Orange Cookies) and Honey Pot Bear (1st Place Topical, Honey Pot Bear Balm) for their victories this year!
For those who couldn‚Äôt be there for a front row view, here‚Äôs a list of the champions and their winning entries.
¬†
¬†¬†¬†Best Sativa Flower
1st Place | Mango Tango by Elemental Seeds
2nd Place | Loud Berry Flower by Loud Seeds SL
3rd Place | Tangie by Dr. Greenthumb
¬†
¬†¬†¬†Best Indica Flower
1st Place | Kosher Kush by Greenwolf LA and Kush Company
2nd Place | Lorax OG by Lorax Labs from CannaSutra Collective
3rd Place | Dr. K's Paris OG Kush by Cali Natural Collective
¬†
¬† ¬†Best Hybrid Flower
1st Place | Wellness OG from the W.E.E.D. in Studio City
2nd Place | Orange Cookies from TLC Collective
3rd Place | 2010 Grizzly Genetics from Grizzly Genetics and Patients Premium Collective
¬†
¬† ¬†Best CBD Flower
1st Place | V.C.D.C. from Moxie Seeds & Extracts
2nd Place | Vitamin CBD from Growers Guild
3rd Place | Vegan Buddha Milagro from Greenwolf LA and Vegan Buddha
¬†
¬† ¬†Best Sativa Concentrate
1st Place | Red Dragon from Dabblicious Extracts
2nd Place | Space Jack from Apothecary Collective and Imperial Extracts
3rd Place | Pineapple Lemonade from Greenwolf LA, Loud Pack Extractions, and Dabblicious
¬†
¬† ¬†Best Indica Concentrate
1st Place | Lemon Walker OG from Gold Coast Extracts
2nd Place | Lemon Walker OG from Gold Coast Collection
3rd Place | Crown OG from Pissing Excellence
¬†
¬†¬†¬†Best Hybrid Concentrate
1st Place | Lemon Bananas from Dabblicious Extracts
2nd Place | Banangie Kosher from Greenwolf LA and Dabblicious
3rd Place | Lemon Cookies from Moxie Seeds & Extracts
¬†
¬† ¬†Best CBD Concentrate
1st Place | Ringo's Gift from POP Naturals and WCHC
2nd Place | Ringo's Gift #3 from Greenwolf LA and Loud Pack Extracts
3rd Place | CBD Simple CO2 from CannaVest
¬†
¬† ¬†Best Non-Solvent Hash
1st Place | Blissful Wizard from Incognigrow Farms
2nd Place | Cookies and Cream Cubantech Drysift from Exotic Genetix
3rd Place | Gluekie Monster from Trichome Heavy Extracts and the Source Genetics

articles.title: The 2014 Denver Cannabis Cup Winning Concentrates
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Extracts and concentrates are quickly becoming a central pillar of the cannabis market, so much so that the High Times Cannabis Cup hosted five concentrate categories this year in Denver. The champions were a mix of familiar classics like Durban Poison and newer strains you probably haven‚Äôt heard of until now. Leafly needs your help furnishing these strains with user reviews, so be sure to share your opinion if you‚Äôve had the opportunity to try one of these champs.
Don't forget to also check out Denver‚Äôs winning flowers from this 4/20 weekend!
¬†
Best Medical Non-Solvent Hash

1st Place: Blueberry Waltz from Natural Mystic Cannabis Caregivers
2nd Place: Sour Lemon OG Solventless from Essential Extracts & Trill Alternatives
3rd Place: HGH Cookies Solventless from HGH Extractions & Pure Medical
¬†
Best U.S. Non-Solvent Hash

1st Place: White OG Solventless Wax from Essential Extracts & Down With Dirt
2nd Place: Boss Ice Wax from Infuzionz
3rd Place: Bruce Banner #3 from RiverRock Adult Use & Trichome Heavy Extractions
¬†
Best Medical Concentrate

1st Place: Sour Jilly from Green Dream & TC Labs
2nd Place: Jilly Bean from Stay Concentrated Extracts
3rd Place: South African Durban Poison Wax from Advanced Medical Alternatives & Dab City Concentrates
¬†
Best U.S. Concentrate

1st Place: 303 OG Nug Run Sugar Budder from The Clinic
2nd Place: Lemon Walker OG from TC Labs & Gold Coast Collective
3rd Place: Willy Wonka Sativa BHO from High Class Concentrates
¬†
People‚Äôs Choice Cup

1st Place: Golden Goat Shatter ‚Äì Infuzionz powered by The Green Solution
2nd Place: Jilly Bean Shatter from 710 Labs/ Bud Med Health Center
3rd Place: K1 Shatter from New Age Medical
